destinations.name: Eiffel Tower
destinations.info: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France.

destinations.name: Cape Town
destinations.info: Cape Town is a port city on South Africaâ€™s southwest coast, on a peninsula beneath the imposing Table Mountain.

destinations.name: Great Wall of China
destinations.info: The Great Wall of China is a series of fortifications that were built across the historical northern borders of ancient Chinese states and Imperial China.

destinations.name: Statue of Liberty
destinations.info: The Statue of Liberty is a colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island in New York Harbor within New York City.

destinations.name: Taj Mahal
destinations.info: The Taj Mahal is an ivory-white marble mausoleum on the right bank of the river Yamuna in the Indian city of Agra.

destinations.name: Colosseum
destinations.info: The Colosseum is an oval amphitheatre in the centre of the city of Rome, Italy.

destinations.name: Machu Picchu
destinations.info: Machu Picchu is an Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains in Peru, above the Urubamba River valley.

destinations.name: Pyramids of Giza
destinations.info: The Pyramids of Giza, located on the outskirts of Cairo, are the only remaining wonder of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

destinations.name: Sydney Opera House
destinations.info: The Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue performing arts centre at Sydney Harbour in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia.

destinations.name: Mount Fuji
destinations.info: Mount Fuji is Japan's tallest peak and one of its most iconic symbols, located on Honshu Island.

destinations.name: Christ the Redeemer
destinations.info: Christ the Redeemer is an Art Deco statue of Jesus Christ in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, created by French sculptor Paul Landowski.
